```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tmap)
data(land)
data(World)
data(metro)
tm_shape(World, bbox = "China") +
    tm_polygons("MAP_COLORS", palette="Pastel2") +
tm_shape(metro) +
    tm_bubbles("pop2010", title.size = "Population") +
    tm_text("name", size = "pop2010", legend.size.show = FALSE, root=8, size.lowerbound = .7, auto.placement = TRUE)
```
